text: Ismael Zambada Garcia (born January 1, 1948) is a Mexican drug leader who has been the co-leader of the Sinaloa Cartel. He was arrested and reported to be in U.S. custody on July 25, 2024. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:People from Sinaloa Category:Mexican drug lords
title: Ismael "El Mayo" Zambada
